name: Xeno Relay Day
description:
One day in a strange galaxy there was a dying Red planet...

That planet is the home to a thriving civilization that already has WiFi

You need to relay a message how to save their planet

But the Red planet is so far away, you need to rely on the network of advanced orbital transmitters to relay the message

Use arrow keys/WASD to turn transmitters and relay message to the Red planet.
